name: calculate_wind_chill
description: Calculates the wind chill index (perceived temperature) based on temperature and wind speed. The function raises a ValueError if the temperature is greater than 10Â°C or the wind speed is less than or equal to 4.8 km/h, as the wind chill formula is not valid under these conditions.

temperature.description: The actual air temperature in Celsius.

wind_speed.description: The wind speed in kilometers per hour.

precision.description: The number of decimal places to round the result to. Defaults to 2.
